subject: Re: How to test private methods, its urgent
msgSnippet: ... Why do you think you need to test private methods?  Private methods support public methods.  Therefore well tested public methods will include the
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, bhanu sistla <sistla_prakash@y...> wrote:
> Hi all
>
> i am having some private methods in a class. how to test them.

Why do you think you need to test private methods? Private methods
support public methods. Therefore well tested public methods will
include the behaviour of the private methods.

There is no real reason for directly testing private methods.

Dave
